title: New: Pale Waves – The Tide
body:
First heard a demo version of this track over three years ago, and knew immediately that it was a festival hit in waiting.

Whilst **Pale Waves** may be almost unrecognisable from the band that emerged from Manchester all those moons ago, their hooks are still as effortless and as addictive. Check out latest track, _The Tide_, below.
